from random import sample

def minimal_cost_partition(N, M, roads):
    first_son_cities = sample(range(2, N), N >> 1)
    return first_son_cities

from random import sample

def minimal_cost_partition(N, M, roads):
    first_son_cities = sample(range(0, N), N >> 1)
    return first_son_cities
